Bolt of Unlife

Unlife Damage:20+
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Mindless [mind], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok])
This bolt passes straight through armor and damages the target's soul directly. If the target is slain he will be filled by the energies from this spell and rise as a soulless warrior.
